Call for Fellowship

Call For Submission

Important Dates :

✓ Last date for submitting application : 15th July 2022 (Closed)
✓ Notification for award of fellowship : 20th July 2022

✓ Last date for submitting application : 30th June 2022
✓ Notification for award of fellowship : 5th July 2022

 

Fellowship Program for ITC Conference 2022 is live !

The 6th IEEE International Test Conference India (ITC India 2022) invites Students, Research Scholars and Faculty members working in the relevant fields of VLSI Design and Test for applying for the fellowship programme. ITC India has been offering generous fellowships to students and teachers of various Indian academic institutions. The fellowship provides complimentary registration to attend all the Tutorials, Keynotes and Technical Sessions.

At ITC India, design, test, and yield professionals can confront challenges faced by the industry and learn how these challenges are being addressed by the combined efforts of academia, design tool and equipment suppliers, designers, and test engineers.

Application Process

  • We will be using an entirely online application process. A Gmail account is required for submitting the application.
  • Applications will be considered on first-come first-served basis.
  • Faculty members, Research scholars and students should upload the scanned copy of their Institution Identity card along with application.
  • Please submit only one form per applicant.

Important Guidelines

  • The authors from academic institution whose paper is accepted in ITC India 2022, will get the preference for the award of fellowship.
  • Research scholars and students applying for the fellowship award must be involved in research areas related to VLSI Design & Test.
  • The faculty members applying for the fellowship award must have been associated in teaching or guiding research projects in VLSI Design & Test and taken active part in conducting workshops or seminars in these areas.
  • It is imperative that the fellows attend tutorials and presentations on all days. A record of attendance would be maintained for the same. A minimum of 90% of attendance is mandatory to receive a participant certificate.
Submit Fellowship

Note: For any concerns/queries, please send an email to info@itcindiatestweek.org
